comment: проповедница human female - стоит перед статуей, читает молитву пастве, стоящей перед ней на коленях (3-4 человека)

languages.text: "Знайте же, что Император милостив, и что свет Его всегда найдет путь!"

traits.locale_text: "Знайте же, что Император милостив, и что свет Его всегда найдет путь!"

languages.text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"
languages.original_text: "Знайте же, что Император милостив, и что свет Его всегда найдет путь!"

traits.locale_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"
"Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

languages.text: “不要忘记，帝皇是仁慈的！祂的明光始终会照在所有人身上！”
languages.original_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

traits.locale_text: “不要忘记，帝皇是仁慈的！祂的明光始终会照在所有人身上！”

languages.text: 「皇帝は常に慈悲深く、その光で正しい道を教えてくださるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝は常に慈悲深く、その光で正しい道を教えてくださるでしょう！」

languages.text: «Sabed que el Emperador es misericordioso y que su luz siempre encontrará el camino».
languages.original_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

traits.locale_text: «Sabed que el Emperador es misericordioso y que su luz siempre encontrará el camino».

languages.text: "Wisset, dass der Imperator gnädig ist, und dass sein Licht immer einen Weg finden wird!"
languages.original_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

traits.locale_text: "Wisset, dass der Imperator gnädig ist, und dass sein Licht immer einen Weg finden wird!"

languages.text: « Sachez que l'Empereur est miséricordieux et que Sa lumière trouvera toujours le moyen de vous atteindre ! »
languages.original_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

traits.locale_text: « Sachez que l'Empereur est miséricordieux et que Sa lumière trouvera toujours le moyen de vous atteindre ! »

languages.text: "Bil ki İmparator merhametlidir ve O'nun ışığı, her daim bir yol bulur!"
languages.original_text: "Know ye that the Emperor is merciful, and that His light will always find a way!"

traits.locale_text: "Bil ki İmparator merhametlidir ve O'nun ışığı her daim bir yol bulur!"
